mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RN, A.* FROM (SELECT NC.*, MEMBERNAME FROM NOTICECOMMENT NC, MEMBER M WHERE NC.MEMBERID = M.MEMBERID AND NOTICENUM = #{noticeNum} ORDER BY NCDATE DESC) A) WHERE RN BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICECOMMENT WHERE NOTICENUM = #{noticeNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICECOMMENT (NCNUM, MEMBERID, NOTICENUM, NCCONTENT, NCIP) VALUES(NOTICECOMMENT_SEQ.NEXTVAL,#{memberId},#{noticeNum},#{ncContent},#{ncIp})
mapper.update: UPDATE NOTICECOMMENT SET NCCONTENT = #{ncContent}, NCIP = #{ncIp} WHERE NCNUM = #{ncNum}
